name: Happy Toss - Boom
description:
Happy Toss is physics game where you have to toss a ball into a bucket.

How to play?

Swipe the ball to throw it. The faster you swipe, the faster the ball if flicked. If you miss, simply double tap and the ball will return to the original position and you will be able to flick it again.

Goal

Get all the balls to fall into the bucket. There are up to 3 balls that have to be tossed inside the bucket in order.
